description: Lists the line items associated with a bill estimate.

parameters.name: billEstimateId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bill estimate to list line items for.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Filters to apply to the list of line items. (dict) --- Represents a filter for listing bill estimate line items. The name of the filter attribute. The values to filter by. (string) --- matchOption (string) --- The match option for the filter (e.g., equals, contains).

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter attribute.

nested_params.name: matchOption
nested_params.description: The match option for the filter (e.g., equals, contains).

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The list of line items associated with the bill estimate.

nested_items.name: serviceCode
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services service code associated with this line item.

nested_items.name: usageType
nested_items.description: The type of usage for this line item.

nested_items.name: operation
nested_items.description: The specific operation associated with this line item.

nested_items.name: location
nested_items.description: The location associated with this line item.

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The availability zone associated with this line item, if applicable.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of this line item.

nested_items.name: lineItemId
nested_items.description: The line item identifier from the original bill.

nested_items.name: lineItemType
nested_items.description: The type of this line item (e.g., Usage, Tax, Credit).

nested_items.name: payerAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the payer for this line item.

nested_items.name: usageAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID associated with the usage for this line item.

nested_items.name: estimatedUsageQuantity
nested_items.description: The estimated usage quantity for this line item.

nested_items.name: amount
nested_items.description: The numeric value of the usage quantity result.

nested_items.name: unit
nested_items.description: The unit of measurement for the usage quantity result.

nested_items.name: estimatedCost
nested_items.description: The estimated cost for this line item.

nested_items.name: amount
nested_items.description: The numeric value of the cost.

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The currency code for the cost amount.

nested_items.name: historicalUsageQuantity
nested_items.description: The historical usage quantity for this line item.

nested_items.name: amount
nested_items.description: The numeric value of the usage quantity result.

nested_items.name: unit
nested_items.description: The unit of measurement for the usage quantity result.

nested_items.name: historicalCost
nested_items.description: The historical cost for this line item.

nested_items.name: amount
nested_items.description: The numeric value of the cost.

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The currency code for the cost amount.

nested_items.name: savingsPlanArns
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of any Savings Plans applied to this line item.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token to retrieve the next page of results, if any.
